variations.name: Static Beast Hold
instructions: Start on hands and knees with knees hovering 1-2 inches off ground
Position hands directly under shoulders, fingers spread wide
Keep knees bent at 90-degree angle, hovering above ground
Maintain neutral spine with core engaged
Hold position for time, breathing steadily
Focus on shoulder stability and core engagement
Keep weight evenly distributed between hands and feet

variations.name: Forward Beast Crawl
instructions: Start in static beast position with knees hovering
Move opposite hand and foot simultaneously (right hand, left foot)
Keep knees low to ground throughout movement
Keep core tight to prevent sagging or arching
Focus on smooth, coordinated movement patterns

variations.name: Backward Beast Crawl
instructions: Move opposite hand and foot backward simultaneously
Requires greater shoulder mobility and core control
Keep knees hovering low to ground
Move backward in controlled, coordinated pattern
More challenging than forward crawl due to reduced visibility

variations.name: Lateral Beast Crawl
instructions: Move both hands to one side, then both feet
Maintain beast position while moving laterally
Requires significant core stability and coordination
Keep body aligned and avoid rotation
Advanced progression requiring greater mobility and control

variations.name: Static Crab Position
instructions: Sit on ground with hands behind you, fingers pointing toward body
Lift hips up to create tabletop position
Keep knees bent at 90 degrees, feet flat on ground
Maintain straight line from shoulders to knees
Hold position with core and glutes engaged
Focus on shoulder extension and hip extension

variations.name: Same-Side Crab Reach
instructions: Lift same-side hand and foot simultaneously
Reach hand forward and up while lifting foot
Maintain balance on opposite hand and foot
Keep core engaged to prevent sagging
Return to starting position with control
Requires significant shoulder mobility and core stability

variations.name: Opposite-Side Crab Reach
instructions: Lift opposite hand and foot simultaneously (right hand, left foot)
Reach hand across body while lifting opposite foot
Requires greater rotational control and stability
Maintain crab position on supporting limbs
More challenging due to cross-body coordination

variations.name: Rotational Crab Reach
instructions: Reach one hand across body and rotate torso
Create full rotational movement through spine
Return to center and alternate sides
Requires exceptional spinal rotation and shoulder mobility
Advanced movement combining reach with rotation

variations.name: Static Ape Position
instructions: Start in deep squat position with feet wider than shoulder-width
Place hands on ground in front of you, shoulder-width apart
Keep hips low, weight on balls of feet
Maintain upright torso with chest up
Focus on hip and ankle mobility

variations.name: Forward Ape Reach
instructions: Lift one hand and reach forward
Maintain deep squat position with supporting hand
Return hand to ground and alternate
Requires hip flexibility and shoulder stability

variations.name: Lateral Ape Reach
instructions: Reach opposite hand laterally across body
Return to center and alternate sides
Requires greater hip mobility and rotational control

variations.name: Rotational Ape Reach
instructions: Rotate torso and reach hand behind opposite leg
Create full spinal rotation while maintaining squat
Lift opposite foot slightly to enhance rotation
Return to center through controlled rotation
Requires exceptional hip flexibility and spinal rotation
Ultimate test of ape position mobility

variations.name: Basic Loaded Beast
instructions: Lift one hand and opposite foot simultaneously
Reach hand forward while lifting foot
Maintain beast position with core engaged
Return to starting position with control
Foundation for more advanced loaded beast variations

variations.name: Rotational Loaded Beast
instructions: Lift one hand and rotate it across body
Reach hand toward opposite side while rotating
Requires significant rotational mobility and stability

variations.name: Extended Loaded Beast
instructions: Lift one hand and reach it fully extended forward
Simultaneously lift opposite foot and extend it back
Create long line from fingertips to toes
Maintain beast position on supporting limbs
Requires exceptional shoulder and hip flexibility

variations.name: Basic Side Kickthrough
instructions: Lift opposite leg and kick it through to side
Rotate hips and torso to allow leg passage
Place foot on ground on opposite side
Return leg through to starting position

variations.name: Extended Side Kickthrough
instructions: Kick leg through with full extension
Reach leg as far as possible to side
Create maximum rotational range of motion
Requires exceptional hip mobility and rotational control
Advanced progression emphasizing range of motion

variations.name: Side Kickthrough Flow
instructions: Perform side kickthrough to one side
Advanced flow pattern combining multiple transitions

variations.name: Basic Underswitch
instructions: Lift opposite hand and rotate it under body
Lift original hand and return to center

variations.name: Extended Underswitch
instructions: Extend reaching hand fully across body
Lift opposite foot during switch for added challenge
Requires exceptional rotational mobility and core stability

variations.name: Underswitch Flow
instructions: Continue rotation to transition to crab
Flow back through underswitch to beast
Requires mastery of rotation and position transitions
Ultimate flow pattern combining multiple advanced movements

variations.name: Basic Front Kickthrough
instructions: Lift opposite leg and kick it forward
Extend leg through space between hand and foot
Place foot on ground in front
Return leg through to starting position

variations.name: Extended Front Kickthrough
instructions: Kick leg forward with full extension
Reach leg as far forward as possible
Requires exceptional hip flexor flexibility and core strength
Advanced progression emphasizing forward range of motion

variations.name: Front Kickthrough to Ape
instructions: As leg extends forward, transition weight
Land in ape position with leg forward
Return to beast through reverse kickthrough
Requires mastery of both positions and transition
Advanced flow pattern combining beast and ape positions

variations.name: Scorpion Reach - Basic
instructions: Lift one leg and reach it across body
Rotate torso to allow leg passage
Reach leg as far as possible

variations.name: Scorpion Reach - Extended
instructions: Lift leg and reach further across body

variations.name: Scorpion Reach - Flow
instructions: Perform scorpion reach to one side
Return to beast through reverse movement

variations.name: Flowing Scorpion - Basic
instructions: Lift leg and reach across body
Flow leg through to opposite side

variations.name: Side Flow - Continuous
instructions: Flow continuously from side to side

variations.name: Crab Tap - Basic
instructions: Lift one hand and tap opposite shoulder

variations.name: Crab Tap - Extended
instructions: Lift hand and reach further across body
Tap opposite shoulder with greater range

variations.name: Crab Tap - Simultaneous
instructions: Lift opposite hand and foot simultaneously

variations.name: Beast Reach - Basic
instructions: Lift one hand and reach forward
Maintain beast position with other limbs
Alternate sides, complete 8-10 repetitions per side

variations.name: Beast Reach - Extended
instructions: Lift hand and reach further forward

variations.name: Beast Reach - Opposite Leg
instructions: Lift opposite hand and foot simultaneously
Reach hand forward while lifting foot

variations.name: Thread the Needle - Basic
instructions: Lift one hand and thread it under opposite arm
Rotate torso to allow arm passage

variations.name: Thread the Needle - Flow
instructions: Thread arm through to transition to side position

variations.name: Inchworm - Basic
instructions: Walk hands out to plank position

variations.name: Lizard Crawl - Basic
instructions: Walk hands forward, dragging back leg

variations.name: Frog Stand - Basic
instructions: Place hands on mat between knees
Lift feet off ground, balancing on hands

variations.name: Frog Stand - One Leg
instructions: Maintain balance on hands and one leg

variations.name: Crab Walk - Basic
instructions: Move forward by stepping with hands and feet

variations.name: Crab Walk - Lateral
instructions: Move laterally by stepping to side

variations.name: Bear Walk - Basic
instructions: Walk forward on hands and feet

variations.name: Bear Walk - Backward
instructions: Walk backward on hands and feet

variations.name: Duck Walk - Basic
instructions: Keep feet wide, toes pointed out

variations.name: Caterpillar - Basic
instructions: Walk feet back toward hands in small steps

variations.name: Caterpillar - Lateral
instructions: Walk hands and feet in lateral pattern

variations.name: Lateral Shuffle - Basic
instructions: Move both hands and feet together
